name: Amiga World Golf
overview: World Golf is a Sports game, developed and published by Apex Systems, which was released in 1996. An addictive and truly original golf game for 1 to 4 players in practice and tournament modes. Five authentic courses from around the world. Five Skill levels. Select between 1, 2, 4 or 18 hole rounds. Auto and manual club selection. Ambient sound effects, realistic ball actions and far more!
